overview:
Uberflip (formerly known as “Mygazines”) empowers marketers, publishers, professionals, educators and corporations with the tools to produce, distribute and track their content on any web enabled device.

Our clients have been converting traditional print versions of magazines, flyers, catalogs, brochures, corporate documents, textbooks, and newspapers into branded digital editions with us since 2008.

As the leader in the interactive marketing and digital publishing industries Uberflip continues to be first to market with the features that empower content - on any device. Our web based software-as-a-service platform converts a PDF into an interactive flip book experience where embedding links, integrating with social media and adding videos is just the beginning. Our easy to use application enables our customers to meet all distribution, security, monetizing, and tracking requirements for their content.

Uberflip’s solutions help our customers save costs and make money through new revenue streams.
